wordGroup: notify party 到货受通知人

sentences.en: Please notify us if the above is not correct.
sentences.cn: 如果上面所说的不正确，请通知我们。

sentences.en: The only course of action left to me was to notify her employer.
sentences.cn: 我可能采取的唯一措施就是通知她的雇主。

sentences.en: We may vary the limit at our discretion and will notify you of any change.
sentences.cn: 我们可酌情决定更改限制，并会将任何变更通知你。
